p: The cytokine storm is one of the fundamental causes of COVID-19 pathogenesis, resulting in excessive inflammation, lung damage, ARDS, and other organ failure. Also, the presence of high levels of TNF-α, granulocyte-colony stimulating factor (G-CSF), macrophage inflammatory protein 1A (MIP-1A), monocyte chemoattractant protein-1 (MCP-1), CXCL-10, IL-10, and IL-7 in severe COVID-19 patients indicates the importance of CRS in the disease progression [16]. So, CRS is considered to be a principal cause of death in COVID-19 patients [117], [118].
